mason_sb_cart_guest.spec.js
Mason Cart Page Guest User
Cart - Display Order Total - Verify that the order total is displayed to the right of the page title.
Cart - Display Product Details - Verify that each product is displayed as a separate line item with relevant details.
Cart - Quantity Field Functionality - Verify total price gets updated if user increases/decreases the quantity or applies a valid promo code.
Cart - Edit Item Functionality - Verify that the Edit Item Drawer functions correctly, allowing users to modify variant options.
Cart - Remove Item from Cart - Verify application shows a success message '<Product Name> was successfully removed from your cart. Undo' at the top of the cart when user removes item from the cart.
Cart - Remove Item from Cart - Verify clicking on Undo at the end of the success message, application adds product back in the cart.
Cart - Save Item for Later Functionality - Verify application shows a success message when product is added to the cart <Product Name> was successfully moved to saved for later'.

Cart - Save Item for Later Functionality - Verify application following details against every line item:- Product Name- Item number- Total price- Thumbnail image of product or product variant added to the cart- When applicable: Color, Size, Width- Pricing- Quantity- Availability- Arrives by- Remove button (when applicable)- Personalization (when applicable)- Protection plan (when applicable).
Cart - Save Item for Later Functionality - Verify Move to cart button is shown and clicking on it product moves from save for later to cart section.
Cart - Apply Promo Code Functionality- Verify clicking on Apply promo code, application shows a text box to enter the code.
Cart - Apply Promo Code Functionality- Verify application shows: 'Promo code <CODE> applied to order' in place of apply promo code
Cart - Apply Promo Code Functionality- Verify application shows following success message on top: 'Promo code <promo code> has been applied to your order.'
Cart - Apply Promo Code Functionality- Verify the applied promo code shows in red and Remove option is shown as well
Cart - Apply Promo Code Functionality- Verify order total gets updated when valid promo code is applied
Cart - Apply Promo Code Functionality- Verify application shows a message when promo code is removed: 'Promo code <CODE> has been removed from your order'

Cart - Display Order Summary Section- Verify order summary shows:- Subtotal- Estimated Shipping- Shipping Surcharge- Estimated Sales tax- Apply promo code (optional) - if not applied to cart - Applied promo code - if applied to cart'
Cart - Need Help Section Functionality- Verify that the Need Help section provides relevant information and functionalities.
Cart - Display Saved for Later Section - Verify Save for Later option is shown against applicable products.

Cart - Display Product Data - Verify application following details against every line item:- Product Name,Item number,Total price,Thumbnail image of product or product variant added to the cart- When applicable: Color, Size, Width- Pricing- Quantity- Availability- Arrives by- Remove button (when applicable)- Personalization (when applicable)- Protection plan (when applicable).
Cart - Display Move to Cart CTA Functionality - Verify application shows a success message when product is added to the cart:'<Product Name> was successfully moved to your cart'.
Cart - Redirect to PDP on Product Name Click - Verify clicking on <Product Name>, application redirects user to the associated PDP.
Cart - Display Remove CTA Functionality - Verify clicking on Remove btn, application removes the item from the Saved for Later section.
mason_sb_empty_cart_guest.spec.js
Mason Empty Cart Page for Guest user
Cart - Display Empty Cart Message -  Verify 'Your shopping cart is empty' text is shown below the page title.
Cart - Display Additional Text for Guest Users - Verify application shows the additional text - 'Have an account? Sign in to view items that were previously added to your cart'.
Cart - Sign In Functionality for Guest Users - Verify clicking on the Sign in text link, application generates the Sign In Drawer.
Cart - Sign In Functionality for Guest Users -  Verify clicking the Sign In btn, application opens the Sign In Drawer.
Cart - Sign In Functionality for Logged In Users -  Verify clicking the Sign In btn, application opens the Sign In Drawer and user can logged In.
Cart - Continue Shopping CTA Functionality for Logged In Users - Verify clicking on the Continue Shopping btn, application redirects user to the homepage.
Cart - Continue Shopping CTA Functionality for Guest Users - Verify application shows the additional text - 'Have an account? Sign in to view items that were previously added to your cart'.
mason_sb_homepage.spec.js
Mason Guest User Home Page
GPH-Promotional Banner Managment - Verify the promotional banner should be displayed On Homepage
GPH-Shoemall Logo Redirect - Verify the appearance and accesibility of the Shoemall logo at the lefthand side
GPH-Sticky Header- Verify the header is sticky through the following pages: PDP
GPH-Search Bar - Verify the search field appearance, help text display, and functionality
GPH-Mega Menu Navigation - Verify Mega Menu Navigation opens on hovering within the CTA
GPH-Account Drawer - Verify generation of the account drawer upon clicking the Account icon
GPH-Cart Icon and Drawer - Verify display and functionality of the Cart icon and drawer
GPF-Newsletter Mailing List Widget - Verify the display of the newsletter widget, text, textbox, form field label, help text, and CTA functionality
GPF-Static Links - Verify Test the display and functionality of static links and associated URLs
GPF-Social Icons - Verify the display and functionality of social icons and their respective hyperlinks
GPF-Copyright and Legal Text Links - Verify the display and functionality of copyright and legal text links
HP-Category Image Tiles - Verify the display and functionality of category image tiles, including image, title, and hyperlinks
HP-Category Grid - Verify the display and functionality of the 6x3 category grid, including image/icon, title, and hyperlinks
HP-Top Brands Image Tiles - Verify the display and functionality of the top brands image tiles, including image, title, and hyperlinks
HP-Brand Logos - Verify the display and functionality of brand logos, including image, title, and hyperlinks
HP-Seasonal Savings Widget - Verify the display and functionality of the Seasonal Savings widget, including product image content cards, navigation arrows, and View All link
Account - Invalid Login Functionality - Verify login with invalid credentials
GPH-Mega Menu Navigation - Verify Mega Menu Navigation opens on hovering within the CTA and on selecting the subcategory it redirected to the corresponding PLP
mason_sb_loggedIn_homepage_auth.spec.js
Mason LoggedIn User HomePage
GPH-Promotional Banner Managment - Verify the promotional banner should be displayed On Homepage
GPH-Stoneberry Logo Redirect - Verify the appearance and accesibility of the Stoneberry logo at the lefthand side
GPH-Sticky Header- Verify the header is sticky through the following pages: PDP
GPH-Mega Menu Navigation - Verify Mega Menu Navigation opens on hovering within the CTA
GPH-Search Bar - Verify the search field appearance, help text display, and functionality
GPH-Account State Update - Verify the header update to display the logged-in user state, display of user's first name under the Account icon
GPH-Cart Icon and Drawer - Verify display and functionality of the Cart icon and drawer
mason_sb_minicart_drawer_guest.spec.js
Mason Cart Drawer

Cart Drawer - Adding a product with variations to the cart - Verify Choose Options drawer gets open when user click on add to cart against a product which has multiple variants from PLP and after adding to cart Cart Drawer opens
Cart Drawer - Adding a product with or without variations from the PDP - Verify cart drawer gets open when user adds any product to the cart from any PDP

Cart Drawer - Opening the Cart Drawer - Verify that clicking the Cart icon in the top right corner of the Global Header opens the Cart Drawer, displaying the correct information with a gray transparent overlay and an X button to close the drawer.
Cart Drawer - Removing items from the cart - Verify if a user clicks the minus button when the qty is 1, application removes the item from the shopping cart.
Cart Drawer - Removing items from the cart - Verify If a user clicks and enters 0 into the qty field, application removes the item from the shopping cart.
Cart Drawer - Removing items from the cart - Verify clicking on Remove button, item gets removed from the cart.

Cart Drawer - Handling quantity adjustments in the cart - Validate that the system prevents users from adding quantities beyond available stock and resets the value if the user exceeds the available quantity.
Cart Drawer - Handling quantity adjustments in the cart - Validate that users can adjust the quantity of items in the cart by clicking the plus or minus buttons.
